Armads.effect: Unit makes a guaranteed followup attack when attacked at HP > 80%.

Assassin's Bow.effect: Effective against fliers. If target has a dagger, it can't make a followup attack and this unit will.

Assassin's Bow+.effect: Effective against fliers. If target has a dagger, it can't make a followup attack and this unit will.

Aura.effect: Restores 5 HP to adjacent allies after any combat this unit initiates.

Berkut's Lance.effect: Grants Res+4 when the unit is under attack.

Berkut's Lance+.effect: Grants Res+4 when the unit is under attack.

Binding Blade.effect: Grants Def/Res+2 when this unit is attacked.

Blazing Durandal.effect: Grants Atk+3. If unit's Atk > foe's, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

Blessed Bouquet.effect: Grants allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+2 through their next actions after any combat this unit initiates.

Blessed Bouquet+.effect: Grants allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+2 through their next actions after any combat this unit initiates.

Blue Egg+.effect: If unit initiates attack, unit recovers 4 HP after the battle.

Blárraven+.effect: Grants weapon advantage vs. colorless foes.

Dark Aura.effect: Grants adjacent allies who use swords, axes, lances, or dragonstones Atk+6 through their actions at the start of each turn.

Deathly Dagger.effect: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on foe through its next action. If unit initiated combat, 7 damage to foe after battle.
